DataElement.preferredName: Person Human Immunodeficiency Virus Emotional Well-being Assessment Result FAHI SubScale Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the score of an individual assessed with the Emotional Well-Being subscale of the Functional Assessment of HIV Infection (FAHI) questionnaire.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Human Immunodeficiency Virus Emotional Well-being Assessment Result
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses._The status of one's general temperament and outlook on life._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._The result of an action._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Human immunodeficiency virus. Species of LENTIVIRUS, subgenus primate lentiviruses (LENTIVIRUSES, PRIMATE), formerly designated T-cell lymphotropic virus type III/lymphadenopathy-associated virus (HTLV-III/LAV). It is acknowledged to be the agent responsible for the acute infectious manifestations, neurologic disorders, and immunologic abnormalities linked to the ACQUIRED IMMUNODEFICIENCY SYNDROME.:Person; a human being.

Concepts.definition: The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses.

Property.preferredDefinition: The status of one's general temperament and outlook on life.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: The status of one's general temperament and outlook on life.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Functional Assessment of Human Immunodeficiency Virus Infection (FAHI) SubScale Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure the quality of life of adults living with HIV infection. This instrument is based on the FACT-G questionnaire._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElement.changeDescription: Functional Assessment of HIV Infection (revised; Peterman, Cella, Mo, & McCain, 1997) subdomain and total scores collected.  Curated to support NCI CCR HIV trial.
